chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: The phone is not working as expected. Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as an GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to only have micro scratches on the shell. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, as seen in the attatched pictures, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for your feedback.

Since the customer has opened the request within the 30 days right of withdrawal and has shipped the device, he has the right for the refund, please refund the amount.

Thank you for your help and have a nice day.


Regards,
Reyhan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

As stated above, the device was purchased as an GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to only have micro scratches on the shell. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, as seen in the attatched pictures, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
JH

Hi ecomobile,

Please do a full refund and contact the SSC.
They will investigate this case and compensate you.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Umit Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
